评论概述: The box rocks back and forth on a flat surface for one
评论详情: The pictures of the box are Awesome!  The box at first glance looks lovely.  However, there are some deal breaker flaws. The first deal breaker on the item I received was the fact that the jewelry box wasn’t leveled off at the factory resulting in a jewelry box that rocks back and forth like a cheap restaurant table.  Secondly, there is a very cheap ribbon that is glued to the underside of the upper lift out jewelry storage top.  Its outrageously ridiculous, which is why you don’t see what I am referring too in any of the pictures!  Even the company selling this Gorgeous POS doesn’t want you to know.  I am not trying to put this company out of business.  The item I received was a beautiful POS

I LOVE my gorgeous gold with red enamel jewelry box! It’s very well made and a nice weight, not at all cheap feeling. It’s the perfect size for my treasures. The entire inside is lined in plush black velvet. Even the underneath is covered in velvet. There are royal blue ribbons on either side of the tray to aid in lifting it out. I highly recommend this exquisite jewelry box to anyone who enjoys beautiful things! I’m so happy I purchased this beautiful box!

This is just so amazing for the price! It blew us away when we opened it! It looks exactly like the picture, but way more pretty. It seems very sturdy and has some weight to it, which gives the illusion of expensive. The enameled red keeps true to the color. The gold decor is brilliant, shiny and also gives the impression that you spent much more! This is a Christmas gift and we think it's going to be a hit. And remember, if you gift a jewelry box, make sure it has a piece of jewelry inside of it, just saying...
